head.supplied: ¶ Royal Bavarian Academy of Sciences to Dr Ferdinand Mueller Esq., Director of the Botanical and Zoological Gardens in Melbourne. ¶ ¶ The Academy of Sciences has received the printed matter kindly s...

div.p: From Justus von Liebig
RB MSS M200a.7, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS with decorative heading. MS envelope front: 'Von der K. Bayr. Academie der Wissenschaften | in München | Sr. Hochwohlgeboren | Herrn Dr. Ferd. Müller | Director des botanischen und zoologischen | Garten | in | Melbourne.'

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: an Sr. Hochwohlgeboren Herrn Dr. Ferd. Müller.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Director des botanischen und zoologischen

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Garten in Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: Die Academie der Wissenschaften hat die ihr gefälligst mitgetheilten Druckschriften:

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Müller, Fragmenta phytographiae Australiae.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.9862in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Vol. 4. Melbourne 1863-64

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: —The plants indigenous to the Colony of Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.9862in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Lithograms. Melbourne 1864-65. 4

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: erhalten, und ich habe die Ehre, den verbindlichsten Dank derselben für diese Mittheilung auszudrücken.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: Ich verbinde hiermit die Versicherung meiner ausgezeichneten Hochachtung

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: München, den 29ten October 1865

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: J v Liebig

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Royal Bavarian Academy of Sciences to Dr Ferdinand Mueller Esq., Director of the Botanical and Zoological Gardens in Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The Academy of Sciences has received the printed matter kindly sent to it:

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Mueller, Fragmenta phytographiae Australiae, vol. 4, Melbourne, 1863-64.
B65.02.09. The volume, now in the Bayerische Staatsbibliothek, Munich, is inscribed: 'Auf Befehl der Regierung von Victoria der Königl. Academie der Wissenschaften zu München dargeboten vom Verfasser' [Presented at the command of the Government of Victoria by the author to the Royal Academy of Sciences in Munich].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
—
The plants indigenous to the Colony of Victoria, Lithograms, Melbourne 1864-65. 4
i.e. quarto. B65.02.06. The volume, now in the Bayerische Staatsbibliothek, Munich, is inscribed 'To the Royal Academy of sciences of Munich offered on behalf of the Victorian Government | by |Ferd. Mueller'.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: and I have the honour to express the Society's sincere thanks for this transmission.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: I combine with it the assurance of my deepest respect.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Munich, 29 October 1865.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The President of the Royal Bavarian Academy of Sciences

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: J. von Liebig.
